Interface RolitObserver

                    java.lang.String rival,
                    Replay replay,
                    GameState state)
        It notifies the observers that the the game is finished
        Parameters:
        rivals - List of rivals
        rival - Type of rivals: teams, players, ...
        replay - Replay of the finished game
        state - Current state of the game
